global_caption: a scene featuring a man wearing a white short-sleeved shirt, brown pants, and black shoes, with a watch on his left hand and black sunglasses, holding a big map; a female with long hair wearing a white, short-sleeved, flowery patterned shirt, short jeans, and black sandals, holding a brown passport and carrying blue luggage; a man wearing a green short-sleeved t-shirt, brown short pants, and black shoes, putting his two hands in his pant's pockets, not wearing sunglasses; and a female wearing a sky blue sleeveless dress and brown sandals, taking a photo with a camera held in her left hands while holding a big straw hat.
